bug.author: larroy
bug.summary: CI seems to pass even though the test might fail
bug.description:
tests/run_all.sh don't have -e so test pass even though some of the unittest files have errors. See this PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/autogluon/pull/280#partial-pull-merging>#280 (comment)</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/szha>@szha</denchmark-link>
